Somos uma organização: We are a non-profit organization created with the mission of supporting public organizations to become more agile in adapting to the digital and sustainable world.
Ajudamos você: We help you as a public manager meet the challenges of innovation and digitalization in the public sector. We build with you solutions to team bulding, governance, and public procurement challenges.
Apoiamos a criação de equipe interna e c: We support internal team building and hiring teams.
Sem equipes de tecnologia: Without adequate and qualified technology teams, technology initiatives do not prosper. That's why it's important to secure a team with the capability to transform your organization using technology.
Apoiamos na definição de perfis necessár: We support you in defining the necessary profiles, the organizational structure, and in procuring multidisciplinary teams in a software studio model, to overcome the difficulties with the traditional software house public procurement
Equipe estruturada e com capacidade de e: Structured team with the ability to deliver quality digital products faster
Apoiamos a escolha de tecnologias aberta: We support the choice of open technologies that generate impact, efficiency, and autonomy.
Tecnologias abertas oferecem soluções co: Open technologies offer common solutions to shared needs across different public organizations. But as well as delivering results, they generate more efficiency in technology spending, guarantee independence from suppliers and allow more flexibility in public service delivery.
Apoiamos na busca de software em código-: We provide support in the search for open source software that solves public management problems, in surveying the market for suppliers of these solutions, and in contracting the implementation, supply, and support of these solutions for the public organization.
Tecnologia aberta contratada e implantad: Open technology contracted and implemented, generating results for the public organization.
Contratar soluções para problemas públic: Public procurement of solutions for public problems
Apoiamos na definição de problemas públi: We support in defining public problems and setting up public procurement for solutions from the innovation ecosystem.
Nem sempre a melhor solução: The best solution to public problems does not always come from within our organizations. Opening up government problems to the innovation ecosystem, allowing for the testing of solutions and their public procurement has great potential for solving these problems creatively.
Apoiamos na definição de problemas públi: We support the definition of public problems and the execution of the call for solutions for the innovation ecosystem. We structure the call based on the bidding foreseen in the Legal Framework for Startups and Entrepreneurship, which allows the payment of the tests by the public organization, as well as its hiring in case these tests are successful.
Teste de soluções e contratação para a r: Testing of solutions and public procurement for solutions of the problem presented.
Entre em contato para discutir conosco s: Get in touch to discuss your needs with us! We can schedule an informal online meeting to think about how we can help you.
